image.title: Cover Image
image.description: Optionally display an image above your message.

link.title: Cover Link
link.description: Optionally link the Cover Image to a URL of your choice. Relative URLs (e.g. /about) are supported.

message.title: Message
message.description: You may include links and style the message with Markdown. Learn more
message.default:
Everyone here would love to wish you a wonderful and happy New Year.

Some [cool things](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2016#Predicted_and_scheduled_events) are going to happen in 2016, get excited!

— Your Friends

hideBeforeToggle.title: Hide the message before a specific date

hideBefore.title: Hide Before
hideBefore.description: The message will always be shown in the preview, but it will be hidden to your site’s visitors before this date.

hideAfterToggle.title: Hide the message after a specific date

hideAfter.title: Hide After
hideAfter.description: The message will always be shown in the preview, but it will be hidden to your site’s visitors after this date.
